category.name: ProductView
category.category_description: Preferences affecting the behavior of Product views

preference.name: Vis_PV_ImageCaptureType
preference.preference_description: Defines the format of the preview image created when saving a Product View from the Lifecycle Visualization application. This is only used if "Image Capture" is enabled for Product View save, and if the "Use image export dialog" option is unchecked. Valid values are "BMP 24bit", "BMP 8bit", "BMP BW", "JPEG 24bit", "PNG 24bit", "PNG 8bit", "PNG BW", "TIFF 24bit", "TIFF 8bit", "TIFF BW".
